Package org.eclipse.ecf.presence.bot

Interface Summary
IChatRoomBotEntry Contents for creating a chat room bot This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.
IChatRoomContainerAdvisor Advisor instance for receiving pre connect events for chat rooms.
IChatRoomMessageHandler Message handler for receiving a chat room message.
IChatRoomMessageHandlerEntry Contents for creating a chat room message handler.
IContainerAdvisor Advisor instance for receiving container initialization and pre-connect notifications.
IIMBotEntry Contents for creating a instant messaging bot.
IIMMessageHandler Message handler for receiving a IM message.
IIMMessageHandlerEntry Contents for creating a im message handler.
